recommended_degree: Sistem Komputer, Teknik informatika, Sistem Informasi, Ilmu Komputer, Sains Data (Diploma, Sarjana)
job_description:
Assisting in hardware and software troubleshooting.
Supporting user account creation and access management.
Helping in data backup and documentation tasks.
Assisting in network maintenance or monitoring.
Supporting IT-related projects or system updates.
